ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Just wanted to share my good fortune...
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats Shada!! (long a now that I know) I would love to hear what your stats are with a full set. Tomerillin ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
Grats Shada!! (long "a" now that I know)

I would love to hear what your stats are with a full set.

Tomerillin

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 10:25 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Just wanted to share my good fortune...


in the span of 2 days i hit level 57, someone walked up to me in sebilis and
handed me a singing steel bracer (a friend but not a close one, i was
shocked to say the least) and VS dropped legs to give me a full set of
singing steel, not to mention some really incredible RL news. i'm still
freakin :)

Shada Iceheart, L57 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
